properties.entry: SELECT CITY_NO, CITY_NAME, NATION_NO, NATION_NAME, COUNT FROM (SELECT CITY_NO, CITY_NAME, TB_CITY.NATION_NO, NATION_NAME, COUNT FROM TB_CITY JOIN TB_NATION ON(TB_CITY.NATION_NO = TB_NATION.NATION_NO) WHERE NOT TB_NATION.NATION_NO = 82 ORDER BY COUNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 8
UPDATE TB_CITY SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE CITY_NO = ?
SELECT CITY_NO, CITY_NAME, CITY_CONTENT FROM TB_CITY WHERE NATION_NO = ? ORDER BY CITY_NAME ASC
SELECT CITY_NO, CITY_NAME, CITY_CONTENT, TB_CITY.NATION_NO NATION_NO, NATION_NAME, FLYING_TIME FROM TB_CITY JOIN TB_NATION ON(TB_CITY.NATION_NO = TB_NATION.NATION_NO) WHERE CITY_NO = ?

SELECT CITY_NO, CITY_NAME, CITY_CONTENT, NATION_NAME, FLYING_TIME, VISA_NAME FROM TB_CITY JOIN TB_NATION ON(TB_CITY.NATION_NO = TB_NATION.NATION_NO) JOIN BRTB_VISA ON (BRTB_VISA.NATION_NO = TB_NATION.NATION_NO) JOIN TB_VISA ON (BRTB_VISA.VISA_NO = TB_VISA.VISA_NO) WHERE CITY_NAME = ?

SELECT NATION_NO, NATION_NAME, CITY_NO, CITY_NAME, COUNT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, NATION_NO, NATION_NAME, CITY_NO, CITY_NAME, COUNT FROM (SELECT TB_CITY.NATION_NO NATION_NO, NATION_NAME, CITY_NO, CITY_NAME, COUNT FROM TB_CITY JOIN TB_NATION ON (TB_CITY.NATION_NO = TB_NATION.NATION_NO) ORDER BY TB_NATION.NATION_NO ASC)) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT BOARD_TYPE, FILE_NO, FILE_PATH, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME FROM TB_FILE WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 9 AND BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT BOARD_TYPE, FILE_NO, FILE_PATH, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME FROM TB_FILE WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 2 AND BOARD_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TB_FILE ( FILE_NO, BOARD_NO, FILE_PATH, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, BOARD_TYPE ) VALUES ( SEQ_FILE.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, 9 )
INSERT INTO TB_FILE ( FILE_NO, BOARD_NO, FILE_PATH, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, BOARD_TYPE ) VALUES ( SEQ_FILE.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, 2 )
UPDATE TB_FILE SET FILE_PATH = ?, ORIGIN_NAME = ?, CHANGE_NAME = ? WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 9 AND BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_FILE SET FILE_PATH = ?, ORIGIN_NAME = ?, CHANGE_NAME = ? WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 2 AND BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_CITY SET CITY_NAME = ?, CITY_CONTENT = ?, NATION_NO = ?, FLYING_TIME = ? WHERE CITY_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_FILE SET FILE_PATH = ?, ORIGIN_NAME = ?, CHANGE_NAME = ? WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 2 AND BOARD_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TB_FILE ( FILE_NO, BOARD_NO, FILE_PATH, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, BOARD_TYPE ) VALUES ( SEQ_FILE.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, 2 )
